participant_1.background:
I like the feeling of being in shape and being able to do well in races.
my favorite thing to do is watch old movies.
i still have a photo from my senior prom in my wallet.
i make cars for a living.
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.

participant_2.background:
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.
i play in a nfl fantasy football league.
I love peaches! They are my favorite fruit.
My appearance is not my priority, I care more about things that interest me.
winter is my favorite season.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching old movies and playing in nfl fantasy football.
I like watching old movies as well. Do you have a favorite?
I love the movie Casablanca. It's a classic.
I love that movie too! The acting is incredible.
I agree! Humphrey Bogart and Ingrid Berman are amazing in it.
I also like the movie Citizen Kane. It's a little strange, but really interesting.
I've never seen that one. I'll have to check it out.
It's a classic film noir movie. You should definitely watch it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new movies to watch.
What do you like to do for work?
I'm an engineer. I design cars for a living.
That sounds like a really cool job!
It's fun, but it can be challenging.
I bet! I'm sure it's rewarding too.
It is! I love being able to see my work out on the road.
Thanks! I'm glad I could talk to you about movies
